name: gecko
description: Filter and highlight domains in your google searches.

scripts.watch: npm run clean && webpack --env mode=development --env watch
scripts.build: npm run clean && webpack --env mode=production && web-ext build -s build -a dist -o
scripts.start: web-ext run -t firefox-desktop -f firefoxdeveloperedition -t chromium -u google.com --source-dir build
scripts.start:firefox: web-ext run -t firefox-desktop -f firefoxdeveloperedition -u google.com --source-dir build

author: Kyle Carhart
